full_text: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZB DATE: 8-7-19 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 1210 1211 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8:00-8:30 AM 806 808 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 4:00-4:30 PM 400 402 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 12:30- 1:00 AM 1231 1231 8:30-9:00 AM 841 849 4:30-5:00 PM 430 432 1:00-1:30 AM 115 115 9:00-9:30 AM 911 913 5:00 -5:30 PM 500 502 1:30-2:00 AM 140 145 9:30-10:00 AM 942 944 5:30-6:00 PM 530 533 2:00-2:30 AM 205 211 10:00-10:30 AM 1061 1063 6:00-6:30 PM 600 603 2:30-3:00 AM 215 215 10:30-11:00 AM 1034 1036 6:30-7:00 PM 630 633 3:00-3:30 AM 300 305 11:00-11:30 AM 1112 1114 7:00-7:30 PM 700 703 3:30-4:00 AM 335 341 11:30-12:00 AM 1148 1150 7:30-8:00 PM 730 730 4:00-4:30 AM 405 408 12:00-12:30 PM 1216 1219 8:00-8:30 PM 800 803 4:30-5:00 AM 435 438 12:30- 1:00 PM 1234 1237 8:30- 9:00 PM 830 833 5:00 -5:30 AM 515 519 1:00-1:30 PM 114 116 9:00-9:30 PM 900 903 5:30-6:00 AM 545 549 1:30-2:00 PM 131 133 9:30-10:00 PM 930 933 6:00-6:30 AM 600 603 2:00-2:30 PM 210 212 10:00-10:30 PM 1000 1003 6:30-7:00 AM 645 649 2:30-3:00 PM 756 757 10:30-11:00 PM 1030 1033 7:00-7:30 AM 705 709 3:00-3:30 PM 901 901 11:00-11:30 PM 1100 1103 7:30-8:00 AM 730 733 3:30-4:00 PM 929 940 11:30-12:00 PM 1130 1133 MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN DOJ-OGR-00026486

text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZB DATE:
TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE
MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented.
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten times and signatures, with some information redacted as (b)(6); (b)(7)(C). The document is a 30-minute check sheet for inmates in special housing units.
